original_text: And the west border was to the great sea, and the coast thereof. This is the coast of the children of Judah round about according to their families.
korean_text: 서쪽 경계는 대해와 그 해안이니 유다 자손이 그들의 가족대로 받은 사방 경계가 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: And the west border was to the great sea
This is the coast of the children of Judah
round about according to their families
